sentences.sContent: ...his severe emotional dysfunction was very clearly apparent.
sentences.sCn: ...他情绪的严重异常是显而易见的。

synos.tran: 功能紊乱；机能障碍；官能不良
功能失调；出现机能障碍；垮掉

words.tran: 非优生学的；对人类有不良影响的
难语症；[医] 诵读困难；阅读障碍
[耳鼻喉] 构音障碍；构音困难
计算障碍；（脑伤或疾病所致的）计算困难
生殖障碍，不孕；发育不全

trans.tranOther: If you refer to a dysfunction in something such as a relationship or someone's behaviour, you mean that it is different from what is considered to be normal.
